TopicTitle: Stockalike 3.75 meter: XL Probe Core and XL SAS

Articles.Content:
Javascript is disabled. View full album

The First part is the Extra Large Inline Reaction Wheel (Part2.cfg). The next is the Remote Guidance Unit, Extra Large (Part.cfg).

The LIRW is still available in KSPX, but since the ASAS Module Large fills the same niche by generating torque, I've modified the cfg to make it work for 3.75 meter parts.

The RGUXL Was the original model for the RGU Large, but it was removed from KSPX when the new RGU was added. I've modified the original to work as a 3.75 meter probe core.

To Install Extra Large Reaction Wheel.

Download the latest version of KSPX (Currently v0.2.6.1)

Download the Extra Large Reaction Wheel cfg.

Go to Gamedata/KSPX/Control/large_sasModule

replace part.cfg with part2.cfg

Play!

To Install Remote Guidance Unit Extra Large.

Download KSPX 0.2.1 from this post.

Extract the cl_large_inline_probe to Gamedata/KSPX/Control

Replace Part.cfg with my updated Part.cfg

To post them I on dropbox together, the SAS had to be named part2.cfg. It does make it easier to tell them apart. The SAS is Part2, the RGU is Part

- - - Updated - - -

If someone can create a proper ModuleManager file for this, that'd be great.

Edited July 18, 2014 by GregroxMun
I would have thought a few people would want to use this.
I am interested, but there is so much happening right now!
